document.full_text: a busy shopping mall near columbine high school was evacuated on wednesday after authorities responding to a small fire at the retail complex found two propane tanks and a pipe bomb, officials said.
document.title: homemade bomb found at mall near columbine high
lines_and_colors: a busy shopping mall near columbine high school was evacuated on wednesday after authorities responding to a small fire at the retail complex found two propane tanks and a pipe bomb, officials said.
